text: Kallu Karthyayani is a 1979 Indian Malayalam film directed by PK Joseph, starring Jayan and Prameela in lead roles. ==Cast== *Jayan * Prameela * Prathapachandran * Radhadevi * Thodupuzha Radhakrishnan * Treesa ==References== ==External links== * Category:1979 films Category:Indian films Category:1970s Malayalam-language films
title: Kallu Karthyayani
